skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

skillTree.name: Pegasus
skillTree.description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

skillTree.name: Ladyâ€™s Mantle
skillTree.description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

skillTree.name: The Blessing of the Lady
skillTree.description: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Blessing of the Lady"

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Leading by Example
skillTree.description: They march because they're told to, and of course because they'll get a 'right proper thrashin'' if they don't.

skillTree.name: Peace and Justice
skillTree.description: While the Knights of Origo aren't crusading, they spend their days praying and meditating, at least until another incursion from the south arrives.

skillTree.name: Champion of the Order
skillTree.description: Donna Don Domingio is the right hand of Grand Master Tyreweld and the champion of the Knights of Origo, a truly valued member of the righteous brotherhood.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for all Knight units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Warrior, not Worrier
skillTree.description: Worry is a waste of energy, it can't change the past, it can't control the future, it only makes today miserable, so go out there and kill those heathens!

skillTree.name: The Sword Purifier
skillTree.description: Sickness must be purged, and purged it shall be!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: 5% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: 10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Sacred Guadian
skillTree.description: Far more than allegiance or loyalty, true dedication to Lady and kingdom further empowers her Knights on the field.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Hatred
skillTree.description: The Knights have crusaded extensively against the enemies of all right thinking folk and as such have gained a considerable reputation from their enemies.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 when fighting against Tomb Kings, Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Arabyan factions

skillTree.name: Crusader Knight
skillTree.description: "The Lady calls me hence. I must answer herâ€¦"

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Tomb Kings, Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Arabyan factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tomb Kings, Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Arabyan factions

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Guardian
skillTree.description: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

Hero action cost: -15%
	(Heroes in local province)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
	(enemy characters in region)

Hero action cost: -25%
	(Heroes in local province)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Noble Disdain
backgroundSkills.description: This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +30% chance of wounding aggressors
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tomb Kings, Chaos, Beastmen, Greenskins, Skaven and Vampire Counts

items.name: The Heathen Dispatcher
items.description: Passed down from Champion to Champion, this sword is fit for a devout and honourable Knight of olden times, ready to dispatch the Heathens.
